channel.title: When You Sell Noted Items To My Shop, They Become Dwarf Remains...HELP!
channel.description: Ok when you sell a non-noted item to any shop in my server it will sell fine no problems. When you sell that same item to the same shop or any other shop when it's noted, it comes up in the shop as dwarf remains. How do I fix this?

item.title: When You Sell Noted Items To My Shop, They Become Dwarf Remains...HELP!

item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Yes, that is czar. But I cannot answer your other questions, sorry.

runefreak10:

Ok when you sell a non-noted item to any shop in my server it will sell fine no problems. When you sell that same item to the same shop or any other shop when it’s noted, it comes up in the shop as dwarf remains. How do I fix this?

ur using umm czar base? if so its because you need to make sure the items are not glitched… maybe by checking ur noted statement… or shop statement
